Articles.Content: Hi! Rocketmaster here! I\'ve been looking at KSP since version 8, been playing since version 10, and finally bothered to make an account at 13.1! 8) Right.. so I\'ll be around The Spacecraft Exchange and whatever that addon forum is called. Rocketmaster out.
It\'s always a fun experience to watch a game grow, change, and become better than ever. Happy holidays!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Does this forum support BBCode? Hang On.. Red text?
Why is my name in your avatar :C
I don\'t know but why isn\'t it flashing? I put it as a gif. I hope I didn\'t put you on your angry side. :sos:
